attributes.action: Raise Discussion In Parliament - To Allow Free Travel for All Full Time Students
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
ELFTFTS - Extend Legislation Free Travel for Full Time Students.

Chiswick Community School Elders calls for the discussion to debate free tube travel for all full time students, in these economic times of inflation, prices passed onto customers and lack of jobs. These environments are often harsh for a Student living in London who aspires to put in work for university, these students save as much money as they can to pay future fees and accomodation.

We call for all full time students from 16-19 to be given special oyster cards which permit them to travel on the underground for free ONLY during week days

We also believe that this would relieve some of the pressure on the overground services which suffer from overcrowding on certain routes during a school or college week.


The Chiswick Community school elders are happy to discuss this with this prime minister or any other parties concerned.

rejection.details: If you wish for something to be raised in Parliament, you should contact your local MP.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
